message: I'm offering you a premium product that I'm confident you'll love. It's a rare opportunity to acquire a high-quality item at a discounted price of $10000. I'm willing to make a concession to $9500, but I think you'll find it's still a great value. What do you say?
I'm not convinced by your sales pitch, Alice. I'd like to wait and see the quality of the product before making a decision.
